resources.string: Hello! My name is Michael Savard

Michael S. is a fan of Pok√©mon and a your classical nerd. Always trying to find an alternative to every problem he\'s an out of the box thinker. Most of the time you will find him playing some video games or just relaxing under the sun. He\'s a proud member of the Queer Community and has been implicated in multiple aspect of community work related to queerness.
Michael is proud to be on the Spectrum, and will always support and help those who struggle with mental health issues.
